message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to acquire a unique product. I believe it holds immense value for you, and I'm confident you'll agree. To kick off our discussion, I'm proposing a price of $1,150,000. This is a starting point, and I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While $1,100,000 is a tempting figure, I believe the true value of this product is significantly higher.  I'm willing to meet you halfway and bring my offer down to $1,125,000. This is a very competitive price considering the potential benefits you'll reap.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1,100,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and propose a price of $1,112,500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, I believe your current offer still undervalues the true potential of this product.  To move this forward, I'm proposing a price of $1,118,000. This is a very slight adjustment on my end, reflecting my commitment to finding a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable going above $1,112,500. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and propose a price of $1,115,000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the value I'll get from the product.
